content: this is a cowl that i made with a special skein of malabrigo rios that i bought as a treat for myself i really liked the way this knitted up and i would like to share it with my fellow knitters so get out your special skein of worsted weight yarn or just go stash busting i did not use the full skein only about 180 yards the cowl is an easy 2 row repeat with knit row in between i did do an i-cord bind off but a regular bind off would work as well there are lots of youtube videos on doing i cord my favorites are knit purl hunter and 10rows a day *disclaimer this pattern has not been tested * i am not a professional pattern writer or designer i do my best to make the pattern user friendly and correct if you find errors i apologize in advance and please let me know thank you and happy knitting
